All Classes

Class Description
Action
Base class for Actions.
ActionList
A thin wrapper for java.util.ArrayList<Action> that does not allow nulls to be added.
ActivatedSiteManager
A ActivatedSiteManager class that manages a list of all activated Site of Lost Graces.
ActivateSiteOfLostGrace
An Action that is entered when the player touches the Site of Lost Grace to Activate it..
Actor
An entity that is alive by having hit points.
ActorLocationsIterator
Represents a bimap of locations and actors.
Ally
An Ally Class (Spawned from summon Sign) that can attack enemies.
Application
The main class to start the game.
Archetype
Archetype class that stores the stats of the player depending on the option chosen by the user.
Astrologer
Type of Archetype class called Astrologer that stores the stats of the player based on teh Astrologer archetype.
AstrologerStaff
AstrologerStaff is a weapon that can be used by an Astrologer Archetype with 274 damage and 50% hit rate
AttackAction
An Action to attack another Actor.
AttackBehaviour
AttackBehaviour allows the enemy to attack other characters if called upon (at each turn usually).
AxeOfGodrick
A weapon used by Godrick The Grafted with a damage os 142 and hitrate of 84%

Type of Archetype class called Bandit that stores the stats of the player based on teh Astrologer archetype.

A class that represents a barrack.

An interface for representing a collection of any kind of enum.

A class that represents a cliff.
Club
A simple weapon that can be used to attack the enemy.
ConsumeGoldenRuneAction
An Action that allows an Actor to consume a GoldenRune and gain a random amount of runes.
ConsumeGoldenSeedsAction
An Action that allows an Actor to cosume a Golden Seed to replenish and upgrade Flask Of Crimson Tears to have 2 more uses.
DeathAction
An action executed if an actor is killed.
DespawnAction
An Action to despawn an Actor.
Dirt
A class that represents bare dirt.

Class that manages I/O for the system
Dog
A Dog (an enemy character).

An Action that doesn't do anything.

An abstract drop action class

Special Action that allows Actors to drop weapons.

A factory class for spawning enemies in specific environments.
EnemyInSurrounding

EnemyWestFactory
A factory class for creating enemies in the west of the map.
Exchange
An interface that represents an exchange between two items.
Exchangeable
An interface that allows an item to be exchanged
ExchangeAction
An Action that allows an Actor to exchange an Item for a WeaponItem.
Exit
Class that represents a route from one Location to another.
FancyGroundFactory
Class that can create different types of Ground based on the character that represents it.

An Action to heal the actor by 250 health points.
